benchmark.tool: *tool to benchmark (name of tool-specific Python module for BenchExec)*
benchmark.timelimit: *optional CPU time limit in seconds (default: none)*
benchmark.hardtimelimit: *optional hard CPU time limit in seconds (tool will be forcefully killed, otherwise identical with timelimit)

tasks.name: *optional name for this subset of tasks*
tasks.includesfile: *file-name pattern for include files (text files with a pattern on each line)*
tasks.exclude: *file-name pattern for exclusion from input files*
tasks.excludesfile: *file-name pattern for exclude files (text files with a pattern on each line)*

benchmark.column: *pattern for extract data for this column from tool output*
